title: La Merienda
subtitle: Snack Time
meta_desc: Learn snack vocabulary in Spanish with audio pronunciation. Ages 2-5.
keywords: learn Spanish preschool, Spanish food book, snacks Spanish, bilingual children books

pages.title: La Merienda
pages.prompt: A fun snack time spread with crackers, cheese, fruit, and popcorn on a table, cheerful setting, professional food photography, landscape orientation, wide 16:9 format, high resolution.

pages.title: Las palomitas son saladas.
pages.prompt: A big bowl of fresh popcorn overflowing, fun movie snack setting, professional food photography, landscape orientation, wide 16:9 format, high resolution.

pages.title: La manzana es roja.
pages.prompt: A shiny red apple on a plate, fresh and crisp, professional food photography, landscape orientation, wide 16:9 format, high resolution.

pages.title: El queso es amarillo.

pages.title: Las uvas son moradas.
pages.prompt: A bunch of beautiful purple grapes on a plate, fresh and plump, professional food photography, landscape orientation, wide 16:9 format, high resolution.

pages.title: La zanahoria es anaranjada.
pages.prompt: Fresh orange carrot sticks arranged on a plate with dip, healthy snack, professional food photography, landscape orientation, wide 16:9 format, high resolution.
